query.description: TC/MD_Q1 Return the title of the article that has matching id attribute value (1).
query.action: for $art in input()/article[@id="1"] return $art/prolog/title

query.description: TC/MD_Q2 Find the title of the article authored by (Ben Yang).
query.action: for $prolog in input()/article/prolog where $prolog/authors/author/name="Ben Yang" return $prolog/title

query.description: TC/MD_Q3 Group articles by date and calculate the total number of articles in each group.
query.action: for $a in distinct-values (input()/article/prolog/dateline/date) let $b := input()/article/prolog/dateline[date=$a] return <Output> <Date>{$a}</Date> <NumberOfArticles>{count($b)}</NumberOfArticles> </Output>

query.description: TC/MD_Q5 Return the headings of the first section of a certain article with id attribute value (9).
query.action: for $a in input()/article[@id="9"] return <HeadingOfSection> {$a/body/section[1]/@heading} </HeadingOfSection>

query.description: TC/MD_Q6 Find titles of articles where both keywords (``the" and ``hockey") are mentioned in the same paragraph of abstracts.
query.action: for $a in input()/article where some $b in $a/body/abstract/p satisfies (contains($b, "the") and contains($b, "hockey")) return $a/prolog/title

query.description: TC/MD_Q7 Find titles of articles where a keyword (``hockey") is mentioned in every paragraph of abstract.
query.action: for $a in input()/article where every $b in $a/body/abstract/p satisfies contains($b, "hockey") return $a/prolog/title

query.description: TC/MD_Q8 Return the names of all authors (one element name unknown) of the article with matching id attribute value (2).
query.action: for $art in input()/article[@id="2"] return $art/prolog/*/author/name

query.description: TC/MD_Q9 Return all author names (several consecutive element unknown) of the article with matching id attribute value (3).
query.action: for $art in input()/article[@id="3"] return $art//author/name

query.description: TC/MD_Q10 List the titles of articles sorted by country.
query.action: for $a in input()/article/prolog order by $a/dateline/country return <Output> {$a/title} {$a/dateline/country} </Output>

query.description: TC/MD_Q11 List the titles of articles that have a matching country element type (Canada), sorted by date.
query.action: for $a in input()/article/prolog where $a/dateline/country="Canada" order by $a/dateline/date return <Output> {$a/title} {$a/dateline/date} </Output>

query.description: TC/MD_Q12 Retrieve the body of the article that has a matching id attribute value (4).
query.action: for $a in input()/article[@id="4"] return <Article> {$a/body} </Article>

query.description: TC/MD_Q13 Construct a brief information on the article that has a matching id attribute value (5), including title, the name of first author, date and abstract.
TC/MD_Q14 List article title that doesn't have genre element.
query.action: for $a in input()/article/prolog where empty ($a/genre) return <NoGenre> {$a/title} </NoGenre>

query.description: TC/MD_Q15 List author names whose contact elements are empty in articles.
query.action: for $a in input()/article/prolog/authors/author where empty($a/contact/text()) return <NoContact> {$a/name} </NoContact>

query.description: TC/MD_Q16 Get the article by its id attribute value (6).
query.action: for $a in input()/article[@id="6"] return $a

query.description: TC/MD_Q17 Return the titles of articles which contain a certain word (``hockey").
query.action: for $a in input()/article where some $p in $a//p satisfies contains($p, "hockey") return $a/prolog/title

query.description: TC/MD_Q18 List the titles and abstracts of articles which contain a given phrase (``the hockey").
query.action: for $a in input()/article where some $p in $a//p satisfies contains ($p, "the hockey") return <Output> {$a/prolog/title} {$a/body/abstract} </Output>

query.description: TC/MD_Q19 List the names of articles cited by an article with a certain id attribute value (7).
query.action: for $a in input()/article[@id='7']/epilog/references/a_id, $b in input()/article where $a = $b/@id return <Output> {$b/prolog/title} </Output>

query.description: TC/SD_Q1 Return the entry that has matching headword (``the").
query.action: for $ent in input()/dictionary/e where $ent/hwg/hw="the" return $ent

query.description: TC/SD_Q2 Find the headword of the entry which has matching quotation year (1900).
query.action: for $ent in input()/dictionary/e where $ent/ss/s/qp/q/qd="1900" return $ent/hwg/hw

query.description: TC/SD_Q3 Group entries by quotation location in a certain quotation year (1900) and calculate the total number entries in each group.
query.action: for $a in distinct-values (input()/dictionary/e/ss/s/qp/q[qd="1900"]/loc) let $b := input()/dictionary/e/ss/s/qp/q[loc=$a] return <Output> <Location>{$a}</Location> <NumberOfEntries>{count($b)}</NumberOfEntries> </Output>

query.description: TC/SD_Q5 Return the first sense of a matching headword (``that").
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e where $a/hwg/hw="that" return $a/ss/s[1]

query.description: TC/SD_Q6 Return the words where some quotations were quoted in a certain year (1900).
query.action: for $word in input()/dictionary/e where some $item in $word/ss/s/qp/q satisfies $item/qd eq "1900" return $word

query.description: TC/SD_Q7 Return the words where all quotations were quoted in a certain year (1900).
query.action: for $word in input()/dictionary/e where every $item in $word/ss/s/qp/q satisfies $item/qd eq "1900" return $word

query.description: TC/SD_Q8 Return Quotation Text (one element name unknown) of a word (``and").
query.action: for $ent in input()/dictionary/e where $ent/*/hw = "and" return $ent/ss/s/qp/*/qt

query.description: TC/SD_Q9 Return Quotation Text (several consecutive element names unknown) of a word (``and").
query.action: for $ent in input()/dictionary/e where $ent//hw = "or" return $ent//qt

query.description: TC/SD_Q10 List the words and their pronunciation, alphabetically, quoted in a certain year (1900).
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e where $a/ss/s/qp/q/qd = "1900" return <Output> {$a/hwg/hw} {$a/hwg/pr} </Output>

query.description: TC/SD_Q11 List the quotation locations and quotation dates, sorted by date, for a word (``word").
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e [hwg/hw="the"]/ss/s/qp/q order by $a/qd return <Output> {$a/a} {$a/qd} </Output>

query.description: TC/SD_Q12 Retrieve the senses of a word (``his").
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e where $a/hwg/hw="his" return <Entry> {$a/ss} </Entry>

query.description: TC/SD_Q13 Construct a brief information on a word (``his"), including: headword, pronunciation, part_of_speech, first etymology and first sense definition.
TC/SD_Q14 List the ids of entries that do not have variant form lists and etymologies.
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e where empty($a/vfl) and empty($a/et) return <NoVFLnET> {$a/@id} </NoVFLnET>

query.description: TC/SD_Q17 Return the headwords of the entries which contain a certain word (``hockey").
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e where contains ($a, "hockey") return $a/hwg/hw

query.description: TC/SD_Q18 List the headwords of entries which contain a given phrase (``the hockey").
query.action: for $a in input()/dictionary/e where contains($a, "the hockey") return $a/hwg/hw

query.description: TC/SD_Q19 Retrieve the headwords of entries cited, in etymology part, by certain entry with id attribute value (E1).
query.action: for $ent in input()/dictionary/e[@id="E1"], $related in input()/dictionary/e where $ent/et/cr = $related/@id return <Output> {$related/hwg/hw} </Output>

query.description: DC/MD_Q1 Return the customer id of the order that has matching id attribute value (1).
query.action: for $order in input()/order[@id="1"] return $order/customer_id

query.description: DC/MD_Q3 Group orders with total amount bigger than a certain number (11000.0), by customer id and calculate the total number of each group.
query.action: for $a in distinct-values (input()/order [total > 11000.0]/customer_id) let $b := input()/order[customer_id=$a] return <Output> <CustKey>{$a}</CustKey> <NumberOfOrders>{count($b)}</NumberOfOrders> </Output>

query.description: DC/MD_Q5 Return the first order line item of a certain order with id attribute value (2).
query.action: for $a in input()/order[@id="2"] return $a/order_lines/order_line[1]

query.description: DC/MD_Q6 Return invoice where some discount rates of sub-line items are higher than a certain number (0.02).
query.action: for $ord in input()/order where some $item in $ord/order_lines/order_line satisfies $item/discount_rate > xs:decimal("0.02") return $ord

query.description: DC/MD_Q7 Return invoice where all discount rates of sub-line items are higher than a certain number (0.02).
query.action: for $ord in input()/order where every $item in $ord/order_lines/order_line satisfies $item/discount_rate > xs:decimal("0.02") return $ord

query.description: DC/MD_Q8 Return the order line item ids of an order with an attribute value (3).
query.action: for $a in input()/order[@id="3"] return $a/*/order_line/item_id

query.description: DC/MD_Q9 Return the item ids of an order with id attribute value (4).
query.action: for $a in input()/order[@id="4"] return $a//item_id

query.description: DC/MD_Q10 List the orders (order id, order date and ship type), with total amount larger than a certain number (11000.0), ordered alphabetically by ship type.
DC/MD_Q11 List the orders (order id, order date and order total), with total amount larger than a certain number (11000.0), in descending order by total amount.
DC/MD_Q12 List all order lines of a certain order with id attribute value (5).
query.action: for $a in input()/order[@id="5"] return <Output> {$a/order_lines} </Output>

query.description: DC/MD_Q14 List the ids of orders that only have one order line.
query.action: for $a in input()/order where empty($a/order_lines/order_line[2]) return <OneItemLine> {$a/@id} </OneItemLine>

query.description: DC/MD_Q16 Retrieve one whole order document with certain id attribute value (6).
query.action: for $a in input()/order[@id="6"] return $a

query.description: DC/MD_Q17 Return the ids of authors whose biographies contain a certain word (``hockey").
query.action: for $a in input()/authors/author where contains ($a/biography, "hockey") return <Output> {$a/@id} </Output>

query.description: DC/MD_Q19 For a particular order with id attribute value (7), get its customer name and phone, and its order status.
DC/SD_Q1 Return the item that has matching item id attribute value (I1).
query.action: for $item in input()/catalog/item[@id="I1"] return $item

query.description: DC/SD_Q2 Find the title of the item which has matching author first name (Ben).
query.action: for $item in input()/catalog/item where $item/authors/author/name/first_name = "Ben" return $item/title

query.description: DC/SD_Q3 Group items released in a certain year (1990), by publisher name and calculate the total number of items for each group.
query.action: for $a in distinct-values (input()/catalog/item [date_of_release >= "1990-01-01"] [date_of_release < "1991-01-01"]/publisher/name) let $b := input()/catalog/item/publisher[name=$a] return <Output> <Publisher>{$a}</Publisher> <NumberOfItems>{count($b)}</NumberOfItems> </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q5 Return the information about the first author of item with a matching id attribute value (I3).
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item[@id="I3"] return $a/authors/author[1]

query.description: DC/SD_Q6 Return item information where some authors are from certain country (Canada).
query.action: for $item in input()/catalog/item where some $auth in $item/authors/author/contact_information/mailing_address satisfies $auth/name_of_country = "Canada" return $item

query.description: DC/SD_Q7 Return item information where all its authors are from certain country (Canada).
query.action: for $item in input()/catalog/item where every $add in $item/authors/author/contact_information/mailing_address satisfies $add/name_of_country = "Canada" return $item

query.description: DC/SD_Q8 Return the publisher of an item with id attribute value (I4).
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/*[@id="I4"] return $a/publisher

query.description: DC/SD_Q9 Return the ISBN of an item with id attribute value (I5).
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item where $a/@id="I5" return $a//ISBN/text()

query.description: DC/SD_Q10 List the item titles ordered alphabetically by publisher name, with release date within a certain time period (from 1990-01-01 to 1995-01-01).
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item where $a/date_of_release gt "1990-01-01" and $a/date_of_release lt "1995-01-01" order by $a/publisher/name return <Output> {$a/title} {$a/publisher} </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q11 List the item titles in descending order by date of release with date of release within a certain time range (from 1990-01-01 to 1995-01-01.
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item where $a/date_of_release gt "1990-01-01" and $a/date_of_release lt "1995-01-01" order by $a/data_of_release descending return <Output> {$a/title} {$a/date_of_release} </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q12 Get the mailing address of the first author of certain item with id attribute value (I6).
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item[@id="I6"] return <Output> {$a/authors/author[1]/contact_information/mailing_address} </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q14 Return the names of publishers who publish books between a period of time (from 1990-01-01 to 1991-01-01) but do not have FAX number.
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item where $a/date_of_release gt "1990-01-01" and $a/date_of_release lt "1991-01-01" and empty($a/publisher/contact_information/FAX_number) return <Output> {$a/publisher/name} </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q17 Return the ids of items whose descriptions contain a certain word (``hockey").
query.action: for $a in input()/catalog/item where contains ($a/description, "hockey") return <Output> {$a/@id} </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q19 Retrieve the item titles related by certain item with id attribute value (I7).
query.action: for $item in input()/catalog/item[@id="I7"], $related in input()/catalog/item where $item/related_items/related_item/item_id = $related/@id return <Output> {$related/title} </Output>

query.description: DC/SD_Q20 Retrieve the item title whose size (length*width*height) is bigger than certain number (500000).
query.action: for $size in input()/catalog/item/attributes/size_of_book where $size/length*$size/width*$size/height > 500000 return <Output> {$size/../../title} </Output>
